Pegatron dodged the attack."I'm Pegatron ninja of the Tsubai clan and 
minion of the shadow spirit.I'm here to duel anyone on an one on one 
duel."he said while landing."Ans it seem you will be my first 
adversary.Do you accept the challenge?" he continued while taking out 
three Shuriken.
